actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to name the Veterans Administration-University of California, San Francisco School of Medicine medical education building to be located on the grounds of the Veterans Administration Hospital, Fresno, California, the "Milo E. Rowell Medical Education Building".

summary.text: Designates the Veterans' Administration-University of California, San Francisco Medical School medical education building to be located on the grounds of the Veterans' Administration Hospital, Fresno, California, as the "Milo E. Rowell Medical Education Building."

titles.title: A bill to name the Veterans Administration-University of California, San Francisco School of Medicine medical education building to be located on the grounds of the Veterans Administration Hospital, Fresno, California, the "Milo E. Rowell Medical Education Building".
